name: Verify Report 02.kp4 Generation and Interaction
description: Validates that Report 02.kp4 generates correctly and can be interacted with after minigame completion.
testObjective: Ensure report generation system creates functional report interface for Ladagocia.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Ladagociass.access minigame has been completed successfully

steps.expected: Report 02.kp4 file is present in filesystem
Report displays information about Ladagocia scan results
Report closes successfully and returns to filesystem

postconditions: Report remains accessible for future viewing
Map system is updated with completion marker
